heading: General Security Requirement
text: Any person or business that owns or licenses computerized data which includes private information of a resident of New York shall develop
column5: implement and maintain reasonable safeguards to protect the security
column6: confidentiality and integrity of the private information including

heading: Compliant Regulated Entity Deemed Compliant
text: A person or business shall be deemed to be in compliance with paragraph (a) of this subdivision if it is a compliant regulated entity as defined in subdivision one of this section.

heading: Administrative Safeguards
text: Reasonable administrative safeguards such as the following...

heading: Designate Employee
text: Designates one or more employees to coordinate the security program.

heading: Identify Risks
text: Identifies reasonably foreseeable internal and external risks.

heading: Assess Safeguards
text: Assesses the sufficiency of safeguards in place to control the identified risks.

heading: Train Employees
text: Trains and manages employees in the security program practices and procedures.

heading: Service Providers
text: Selects service providers capable of maintaining appropriate safeguards
column5: and requires those safeguards by contract.

heading: Adjust Program
text: Adjusts the security program in light of business changes or new circumstances.

heading: Technical Safeguards
text: Reasonable technical safeguards such as the following...

heading: Assess Network/Software Design
text: Assesses risks in network and software design.

heading: Assess Processing/Storage Risks
text: Assesses risks in information processing

heading: Detect/Prevent Attacks
text: Detects
column5: prevents and responds to attacks or system failures.

heading: Test and Monitor
text: Regularly tests and monitors the effectiveness of key controls

heading: Physical Safeguards
text: Reasonable physical safeguards such as the following...

heading: Assess Storage/Disposal Risks
text: Assesses risks of information storage and disposal.

heading: Detect/Prevent Intrusions
text: Detects

heading: Protect Unauthorized Access
text: Protects against unauthorized access to or use of private information during or after the collection
column5: transportation and destruction or disposal of the information.

heading: Data Disposal
text: Disposes of private information within a reasonable amount of time after it is no longer needed for business purposes by erasing electronic media so that the information cannot be read or reconstructed.

heading: Small Business Compliance
text: A small business complies... if the security program contains reasonable administrative
column5: technical and physical safeguards that are appropriate for the size and complexity of the small business.
